function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 in the built environment","Impact":"Spread of the virus, potential illness, and possible fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing effective control and mitigation measures","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV germicidal irradiation, and touchless technologies","People":"Occupants of buildings, property management industry workers","Owner":"Property management industry, building owners"},{"Description":"Data collection and analysis during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential exposure to the virus during data collection","Mitigation":"Utilizing online survey methods, practicing social distancing during data collection","Technologies":"Online survey tools, data analytics software","People":"Researchers, survey participants","Owner":"Research team, survey organizers"},{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about technical responses to infections in workplaces","Impact":"Uninformed decision-making, potential for increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Sharing research findings, providing guidelines and recommendations for workplace infection control","Technologies":"Online knowledge-sharing platforms, communication tools","People":"Decision-makers, workplace administrators","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities"}]}
